com.karusmc.xmc.util

Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.karusmc.xmc.util.Validator

  • public class Validator
extends Object
    Provides methods for determining if a command can be executed in the case.

      • Validator

        public Validator()

    • Method Detail

      • canUse

        public static boolean canUse(XMCommand command,
                             org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
        Determines if the sender is allowed to execute the command.
        Parameters:
        command - the command to be executed
        sender - source object which is executing this command
        Returns:
        true if
        • console is allowed and the sender has permission to execute the command
        • console is not allowed, but the sender is a player and has permission to execute the command
        See Also:
        XMCommand.isConsoleAllowed()

      • canUseInWorld

        public static boolean canUseInWorld(ConfigurableCommand command,
                                    org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
        Determines if the sender is allowed to execute the command in the sender's current world.
        Parameters:
        command - the command to be executed
        sender - source object which is executing this command
        Returns:
        true if
        • command has a whitelist and sender is a Player and is in a whitelisted world
        • command has a blacklist and sender is a Player and is not in a blacklisted world
        See Also:
        ConfigurableCommand.hasBlacklist(), ConfigurableCommand.getWorlds()

      • hasLength

        public static boolean hasLength(int min,
                                int length,
                                int max)
        Determines if the length is between the boundaries.
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum length, inclusive
        length - a length
        max - the maximum length, inclusive
        Returns:
        true if within the specified boundaries

      • hasCooldown

        public static boolean hasCooldown(ConfigurableCommand command,
                                  long currentTime,
                                  long lastUse)
        Determines if there is a usage cool-down remaining.
        Parameters:
        command - the command to be executed
        currentTime - current time in milliseconds
        lastUse - last usage in milliseconds
        Returns:
        if there is still a cool-down remaining.
